hypothesis_content.title: BTC Daily RSI Oversold Bounce in Neutral Regime
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC daily RSI(14) drops below 35 during NEUTRAL regime (confidence > 55%), price will mean-revert upward by at least 5% within 3 trading days, providing a positive risk-adjusted return.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In neutral regimes, BTC tends to range-bound with defined support/resistance. Oversold RSI levels often signal exhaustion in selling pressure, especially when price remains above longer-term moving averages. Recent market stress from hedge fund liquidations may create exaggerated moves that revert.
